title: Merch Ant

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Sell merch to someone, giving them a one use ability of your choice (host can rule 17 it) and assembling them into your colony.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players in your colony may, once per game, sell merch to someone else, but the merch can only be a single use Basic Attack or a single use self Powerful Defense.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure that at least 5 people who have had your merch are alive at the end of the game. This number is reduced by one for every living colony member at the end of the game.
